name: ASICS Gel-Lyte III Sean Wotherspoon x atmos

details.description:
The "ASICS Gel Lyte III Sean Wotherspoon x atmos" is a collaboration between Sean Wotherspoon with Atmos and ASICS.

This Gel Lyte III  model comes in a multi-color. The sneaker features corduroy upper and interchangeable side stripes, finished in a mismatched color palette. The left pair has light and dark purple on the toe-box, dark brown on the heel, dark navy on the quarter panels, and mint green across the collar and lace-stays. The right pair has light and dark orange toe-box, pastel blue quarter panels, a teal heel, and light gray collar and lace-stays.

The ASICS Gel Lyte III Sean Wotherspoon x atmos was released on the 27th of June 2020, retailing for $165.

name: ASICS Gel-Lyte III Nice Kicks Castlerock
ASICS Gel-Lyte III Remastered Kith Seoul

details.description:
The ASICS Gel-Lyte III Remastered Kith Seoul pushes the limits of the original GEL-LYTE III design with a bold, mixed-material construction.

Released to celebrate the opening of Kith’s flagship store in Seoul, South Korea, this sneaker is the third edition of ASICS and designer Ronnie Fieg’s GEL-LYTE III Remastered. It pays homage to South Korea’s flag through the colorway, which sees the quilted-suede base dressed in Off-white with red, Chambray blue, and black accents. The overlays are crafted from hairy suede, while the stripe-like overlays are made from leather. Finally, the sneaker houses a lining made of terry cloth instead of synthetic material.

Our experts like how far the upper design strays from the typical Gel-Lyte III look. Specifically, the combination of hairy and smooth suede gives the sneaker a premium, handcrafted feel, standing out from all other models before it. The ASICS Gel-Lyte III Remastered Kith Seoul was released on May 31, 2024, and sold for $195.

name: ASICS Gel-Lyte III '07 Remastered Kith By Invitation Only

details.description:
The ASICS Gel-Lyte III '07 Remastered Kith By Invitation Only is part of a limited-edition collaboration between American designer Ronnie Fieg and ASICS.

The shoe was released in limited quantities and could only be purchased at a Kith store, with a special QR code, and after following specific directions on the brand’s website. It’s also the one-hundredth shoe released by ASICS in partnership with Kith. The sneaker boasts an upper made of pigskin suede in five different shades of blush, ranging from light to bold. The lightest colors can be found at the toe, while the shades on the heel are deeper. The vamp and side panels feature a collection of stylized perforations that allow the foot to breathe and create texture.

Our StockX experts like the off-white color of the midsole and outsole, which gives the sneaker a retro feel. The ASICS Gel-Lyte III '07 Remastered Kith By Invitation Only was released on November 28th, 2023, and retailed at $195.

name: ASICS Gel-Lyte III Remastered Ronnie Fieg Super Yellow

details.description:
The ASICS Gel Lyte III Remastered Ronnie Fieg Super Yellow showcases a thoughtfully designed aesthetic, predominantly cloaked in a refined shade of grey. At the same time, its distinctive character is accentuated by the vibrant yellow stripes gracefully adorning the sides.

The Remastered Ronnie Fieg "Super Yellow" boasts a fusion of style and technology. Its upper showcases premium materials, combining suede and leather for a luxurious touch. The iconic split tongue design offers a unique look, while the yellow stripes on the sides provide a pop of contrast. The Gel cushioning technology in the sole ensures exceptional comfort, while the set of laces allows for customizable styling, making it a standout choice in form and function.

Our team is captivated by the shoe, and one feature that truly stands out is the iconic split tongue design. Our experts admire how it encapsulates the essence of the Gel Lyte III silhouette, offering a unique visual flair that has become synonymous with the sneaker. The ASICS Gel Lyte III Remastered Ronnie Fieg Super Yellow was released on the 27th of February, 2023, and retailed for $195.

ASICS Gel-Lyte III '07 Remastered Kith Marvel X-Men Mystery Sealed Box (Trading Card Included)

details.description:
Introduced on July 28, 2023, the ASICS Gel-Lyte III Kith Marvel X-Men Mystery Sealed Box is an enigma wrapped in a shoebox. Kith and Marvel unite to bring sneaker and comic book fandoms together.

Packed inside each sealed mystery box is the iconic Gel-Lyte III silhouette, reimagined with one of seven possible Marvel X-Men themed variations. Each pair captures the essence of a different X-Men character, adding an extra layer of excitement as you unbox. To enhance the collector's experience, each box also includes a special edition trading card - a nod to the captivating lore of X-Men and Marvel's legendary storytelling.

A box of surprises, the ASICS Gel-Lyte III Kith Marvel X-Men Mystery Sealed Box was released on July 28, 2023, with a retail price of $195. Experience the thrill of unboxing your very own superhero story with this piece of sneaker and comic book history.

name: ASICS Gel-Lyte III OG Obsidian Grey
ASICS Gel-Lyte III Remastered Ronnie Fieg Super Orange

details.description:
The ASICS Gel Lyte III Remastered Ronnie Fieg Super Orange was released in honor of the inauguration of Kith's Beverly Hills flagship store.

The Orange ASICS Gel Lyte III Remastered Ronnie Fieg boasts an exquisite blend of materials, combining premium suede and breathable mesh in its construction. The upper is beautifully designed with a harmonious contrast between Pumice Stone and Orange Tiger, creating a captivating visual appeal reminiscent of the city's eclectic charm. The colorway encapsulates a sense of boldness and nostalgia, making it versatile for various casual outfits.

What we love about the shoe is its signature split tongue design that the Gel Lyte III is renowned for. This distinctive feature adds an element of uniqueness to the shoe and contributes to an exceptional fit, ensuring maximum comfort during extended wear. The split tongue provides a snug yet flexible feel, preventing the discomfort often associated with traditional tongue constructions. The ASICS Gel Lyte III Remastered Ronnie Fieg Super Orange was released on the 6th of June, 2023, and sold at $195.
